data.title: Kobe Bryant Essay
data.meta_description: Free Essays from Bartleby | “Did you see that man Kobe Bryant last night? He put the team on his back!” This is what everyone at school was saying during the...
data.text:
“Did you see that man Kobe Bryant last night? He put the team on his back!” This is what everyone at school was saying during the 2009 NBA finals. At the time I was in the seventh grade and had no idea what was going on, although it interested me since all my friends knew about this event. After school that day, I saw a commercial on ESPN advertising all basketball fans to watch, “Kobe Bryant and the Los Angeles Lakers take on the Orlando Magic tonight at 6 pm.” The commercial informed me with the

The Black Mamba, Kobe Bean Bryant, became the youngest player to ever join the NBA, and has struggled personally to become one of the most successful players of all time.\\\\\ Kobe Bryant was born on August 23rd in 1978 and named after a famous steakhouse. At just the age of 6 Kobe’s dad (Joe Bean Bryant) had retired from the NBA and decided to move his family to Italy to play overseas basketball. Joe had a stellar college career averaging 20.3 points and 11.1 rebounds per game but couldn't compete

Basketball player kobe bryant has won 5 nba championships with the los angeles lakers. While establishing himself as one of the games greatest scorers. He was born in 1978 in philadelphia kobe bryant spent his early years in italy he went to the nba straight out of high school. He has been on the same team for his whole nba career “lakers” . Kobe is the best shooting gaurd to play the game and to play for the same team for 18 years , still competing at the age of 50 . He led the NBA in scoring during

There’s always a point in life where all of us reflect. For Kobe Bryant, that time was when he finally retired from professional basketball. Kobe Bryant had achieved a substantial amount of success in his basketball career. However, when it came to relationships with family: he failed. Bryant expresses that he regrets how he dealt with family relationships. He wants all of us to learn from his mistakes. Kobe Bryant has made millions of dollars throughout his basketball career. Like most people

Who is thirty-eight years old, retired from the National Basketball Association (NBA) greatest players of all time? No, it’s not Lebron James, it’s Kobe Bryant. He is a NBA legend who recently retired after a record setting twenty year career with the same team which is the Los Angeles Lakers. After retirement, Kobe Bryant now lives in Newport Coast, California with his wife Vanessa, and two daughters Natalia and Gianna in their $6,116,500 million dollar home. He was, and still is all about winning

“The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.” That quote from Kobe Bryant, a 5 time NBA champion, illustrates a huge part of this story. I want to impart to you somebody in my life who has affected me enormously, my role model, Kobe Bryant. My role model is a hard working human being, who thrives on being the best person he can be and the greatest basketball player ever to play the game. The reason behind my hard work and success is

Kobe Bryant’s Public Relations Disaster Introduction Kobe Bryant before the NBA Growing up with former NBA player Joe Bryant as a father meant that basketball was a relevant part of Kobe Bryant’s life from the beginning. Being a devoted basketball player as a child led to Bryant joining his high school’s basketball team, and leading it to victory 4 years in a row in the state championship. During this time Bryant also began exercising with the Philadelphia 76ers. With his dream of one day playing

Yelling “KOBE” while throwing a crumpled paper ball into the trashcan is something every sports fan in the world have done at one point of their life. After winning five time NBA championships, voted two time NBA Final MVP, two time scoring champion, his accomplishments speaks for his greatness, and that is Kobe Bryant. Bryant is now a retired professional basketball player who played in Los Angeles Lakers for 20 years. Throughout his remarkable career, Bryant developed a heroic figure as he pursued

knows about. His name is Kobe Bryant and he played on the Los Angeles Lakers. Kobe bryant was born on August 23,1978, he is known as one of the best NBA players. He cared a lot for his fans, he has also went through so much for his family, friends, himself, and his fans. Kobe bryant was such a inspiration for me. So many people loved basketball but as soon as kobe hit the court, It was such a different era. Basketball became more competitive and more fun to watch.Kobe bryant even held open his own

“I’ve always thought Kobe was the best player in Basketball. I don’t think it’s even close.” Kobe Bryant spent his childhood in a wealthy family. Kobe had an amazing career as a pro NBA basketball player. He was accused of raping a 19 year old woman. Kobe is clearly one of the most talented NBA players to ever play.100 Kobe had a very interesting childhood. He was born on August 23, 1978 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
